Event.name: triggerChoices
Event.desc: Triggers the setting/engaging of button/checkbox clicked, passes to appropriate port

Event.name: setvehicle
Event.desc: Triggers the spawning of the vehicle chosen in the setVehicle event.

Event.name: beammeup_car
Event.desc: Sends call to engine just like pressing 6. Triggers teleport to last vehicle. Lamentably, no peanuts on the flight.

Event.name: readythebeamscotty_self1
Event.desc: Sends call to grasp your chosen coordinates tightly in its pocket for lunch.

Event.name: beammeup_self1
Event.desc: Scotty turns you into pure light and returns you to the ship, he keeps your pocket change as a tip.

Event.name: readythebeamscotty_self2
Event.desc: Sends call to grasp your chosen coordinates tightly in its pocket for lunch.

Event.name: beammeup_self2
Event.desc: Scotty turns you into pure light and returns you to the ship, he keeps your pocket change as a tip.

Event.name: f_lock_saveposition1
Event.desc: At control panel 1, Scotty holds a lightswitch rave and locks it up, unable to save new coordinates til it's unclocked, captain!

Event.name: f_lock_saveposition2
Event.desc: At control panel 2, Scotty holds a lightswitch rave and locks it up, unable to save new coordinates til it's unclocked, captain!

Function.name: setChoices
Function.desc: Grabs button/checkbox input and sets the choice for which setting you want to enable/disable

param.name: varID
param.desc: Grabs button/checkbox input and sets the choice for which setting you want to enable/disable

Function.name: spawnVehicle
Function.desc: Var passed from GUI, grabs button input and selects the vehicle corresponding to button.

param.name: vehicleChoice
param.desc: Var passed from GUI, grabs button input and selects the vehicle corresponding to button.
